column2: jennifer ann - age 46 of lebanon passed away on thursday
column4: 2015. she was preceded in death by father
column5: robert b. thompson. mrs. hicks is survived by husband
column11: beth (ken) seay; and numerous other loving family and friends. mrs. hicks was in retail merchandise with hallmark. a celebration of life service will be held on monday
column13: 2015 at 6 p. m. in the walter hill baptist church with visitation from 4 p. m. until the service. pastor shelby will officiate. partlow funeral chapel is in charge of arrangements. 615-444-7007 obit line 615-444-7700 www. partlowchapel. com
